Eclipse build: 3.2RC4

I am unable to work out which file it is that's causing this problem, assuming it's a specific file, but am happy to provide the contents of that file if anyone can help me work out which one it is.

Well, one of the files is at least 57000 bytes long, (from the messsage that says "input could not be
parsed correctly at position 57840"). Does that help narrow it down? 

And, while you picked up on "updating index" (a read only task) the stack traces indicate the document is actively being changed. Are you just typing in the documents? Do you have other tools (or add ons) with change the file for you?
